item.title: Bella add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "You're off to Great Places! Today is your day! Your mountain is waiting, So... get on your way!" -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Bella add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "So be sure when you step, Step with care and great tact. And remember that life's A Great Balancing Act. And will you succeed? Yes! You will, indeed! (98 and ¾ percent guaranteed) Kid, you'll move mountains." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Bella add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Things may happen and often do to people as brainy and footsy as you" -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Bella add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Congratulations! Today is your day. You're off to Great Places! You're off and away!" -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Bella add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "You have brains in your head. You have feet in your shoes. You can steer yourself any direction you choose." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Bella add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description:
"And will you succeed? Yes! You will, indeed! (98 and 3/4 percent guaranteed.)
KID, YOU'LL MOVE MOUNTAINS!
So... be your name Buxbaum or Bixby or Bray or Mordecai Ali Van Allen O'Shea, you're off to Great Places! Today is your day! Your mountain is waiting. So...get on your way!" -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Bella add a quote by A.A. Milne
item.description: "Promise me you'll always remember: You're braver than you believe, and stronger than you seem, and smarter than you think." -- A.A. Milne

item.title: Bella add a quote by A.A. Milne
item.description: "Sometimes,' said Pooh, 'the smallest things take up the most room in your heart." -- A.A. Milne

item.title: Bella add a quote by A.A. Milne
item.description: "One of the advantages of being disorganized is that one is always having surprising discoveries." -- A.A. Milne

item.title: Bella add a quote by A.A. Milne
item.description: "People say nothing is impossible, but I do nothing every day." -- A.A. Milne

item.title: Bella add a quote by A.A. Milne
item.description: "Rivers know this: there is no hurry. We shall get there some day." -- A.A. Milne

item.title: Bella add a quote by A. A. Milne
item.description: "The things that make me different are the things that make me." -- A. A. Milne

item.title: Bella add a quote by A.A. Milne
item.description: "Sometimes, if you stand on the bottom rail of a bridge and lean over to watch the river slipping slowly away beneath you, you will suddenly know everything there is to be known." -- A.A. Milne

item.title: Bella add a quote by A.A. Milne
Bella add a quote by A.A. Milne
item.description:
"I don’t feel very much like Pooh today," said Pooh.
"There there," said Piglet. "I’ll bring you tea and honey until you do." -- A.A. Milne

item.title: Bella add a quote by A.A. Milne
item.description: "Pay attention to where you are going because without meaning you might get nowhere." -- A.A. Milne

item.title: Bella add a quote by A.A. Milne
item.description: "Bouncy trouncy flouncy pouncy fun fun fun fun fun. The most wonderful thing about tiggers is I'm the only one!" -- A.A. Milne

item.title: Bella add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "We are all in the gutter, but some of us are looking at the stars." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Bella add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Be yourself; everyone else is already taken." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Bella add a quote by George Bernard Shaw
item.description: "Life isn't about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself." -- George Bernard Shaw

item.title: Bella add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "Always do what you are afraid to do." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Bella add a quote by Paul McCartney
item.description: "And, in the end The love you take is equal to the love you make." -- Paul McCartney

item.title: Bella add a quote by John Milton
item.description: "The mind is its own place, and in itself can make a heaven of hell, a hell of heaven.." -- John Milton

item.title: Bella add a quote by Antoine de Saint-Exupéry
item.description: "The most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or touched, they are felt with the heart." -- Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

item.title: Bella add a quote by Walt Disney Company
item.description: "Around here, however, we don't look backwards for very long. We keep moving forward, opening up new doors and doing new things, because we're curious...and curiosity keeps leading us down new paths." -- Walt Disney Company
